line_1: I see, or is it fancy that portrays?
line_2: The prospect stand before my ardent gaze:

line_1: From the warm picture youth's rash hand pourtrays!
line_2: And pain and sorrow strike — how many ways!
The glory of thy high official days,

line_1: With clouted shoon he on the sand pourtrays.
line_2: While many a crooked line and curious maze

line_1: Not so with those where perverse skill pourtrays
